Text: by Yves Smith   This unprecedented election season is finally coming to a close. Join us for commentary and discussion as the results roll in.   Lambert will kick off the election night live blog at 8:30 PM tomorrow evening. With the presidency and the Senate majority in play, thereâ€™s a lot to watch.
